code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{parseError}from'../services/utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useAuth();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setLoading(true);try{await login(email,password);}catch(err){setError(parseError(err)||'Login failed.
